steps.title: Buy him a drink or ask for his phone number.
steps.content: Buy him a drink or ask for his phone number . A whopping 95% of single men in the US like the idea of a woman making the first move . Keep up that daring, assertive style by being the first to lean in for a kiss . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Chin down, eyes up.
steps.content: Chin down, eyes up. Who knew looking sexy was so easy? Men find women hotter when they strike this pose. [2] X Research source

steps.title: It shows off your interests and makes for an easy conversation starter.
steps.content: It shows off your interests and makes for an easy conversation starter. You'd be surprised how many guys get scared away because they couldn't think of what to say. Put your book on the bar to give them a topic to start with. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Share your secret ridiculous interests or weird hobbies.
steps.content: Share your secret ridiculous interests or weird hobbies. It's not just passionate nights and sexy outfits that stick in a man's head—the goofy, quirky, incredibly you moments can be the most endearing of all. [4] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. Don't be afraid to share the deep secrets of your Netflix history or the walrus tooth collection hiding in your closet. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Men use humor to show off, so reward it when you're interested.
steps.content: Men use humor to show off, so reward it when you're interested. A lot of men crack jokes to impress women, whether or not they're any good at it! Give them a chuckle if you want to signal you're a willing target. [6] X Research source You can even have it both ways and still mock-complain about how awful his puns are afterward—a little teasing is a great part of flirting too! [7] X Research source

steps.title: Men love to feel needed and knowledgeable.
steps.content: Men love to feel needed and knowledgeable. It's a little "damsel in distress", but it's effective. If you don't feel like play-acting, wait until you have an actual question or problem, but save it for the guy you're interested in. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Flirtatious touches
steps.content: Flirtatious touches are a great way to turn a guy on. Men in many cultures aren't used to physical intimacy, so even a little contact can give him shivers. Turn and grab his arm when you want to ask him a question, playfully kick him under the table if he teases you, or, for a big move, touch your hand to his cheek or chin. [9] X Research source Reader Poll: We asked 3954 wikiHow readers how they like their partner to show affection, and 52% said they enjoy cuddling, hugging, kissing, or other forms of touch. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Show that you're uninhibited and ready for a good time.
steps.content: Show that you're uninhibited and ready for a good time. At the restaurant, that is. Good food and romance are both about enjoying life, not restraining ourselves and worrying about sauce on our hands. Order something delightful and indulgent. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Go for that next-morning dress shirt look.
steps.content: Go for that next-morning dress shirt look. It says something both sexy and intimate: you slept over, and now you're claiming his clothes. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Excitement and even fear heightens attraction.
steps.content: Excitement and even fear heightens attraction. [12] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. Think outside the box and plan a date that will get his blood pumping: rock climbing , a haunted house, live music , or something as simple as surprising him with a unannounced drive to a place he's never seen before. [13] X Research source
